text: Hard Ground is a 2003 western TV movie directed by Frank Q. Dobbs and starring Burt Reynolds and Bruce Dern. It is the last film directed by Dobbs. The cinematography was made by Maximo Munzi. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American films Category:Films directed by Frank Q. title: Hard Ground
